::The Lavacons::

The Lavacons spread out, some machinegun fire hitting them as they
flew back away from Rampage. Astral growls, barking out a command to
combine.

The four Lavacons jump into the air, transforming into various
bodyparts untill a 40-foot robot stood in front of Rampage, though the
robot was missing a left arm. Astral made a mental note to beat the
slag out of Fenox next time he saw her.

"Die, slagging bot!" Lavatron yells as he lifts his right arm and
points the palm at Rampage. Storm clouds gather above him, a lightning
bolt flying out of his hand, heading for Rampage.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: is the Element firing four EMP blasts, one missile, and five 
> plasma blasts at each bot on the field?
> 
> ::Razorclaw/Divebomb/Rampage::
> Razorclaw destroys the missiles being guided at Rippersnapper 
> with his lightning gun in between dodging blasts, though a couple 
> are absorbed into his armour. He follows up by sending three more 
> lightning blasts at Mantle.
> 
> Divebomb transforms, using his heightened agility to dodge straight 
> up many of the shots heading at him. Two of the shots smash into 
> his metallic wings, leaving charred marks, and almost knocking 
> him from the sky. His rocket boosters send him straight up at an 
> increasing speed, away from the near battle.
> 
> Rampage is so angry; consequently, he has lost "it". As one of the 
> laser blasts hits him, he dives to the ground, dodging the missiles 
> and the rest of the shots. He transforms into tiger mode as he hits 
> the ground. Immediately, he begins firing as much as he can, 
> pumping out continues rounds from his four leg mounted machine 
> guns at Astral, and the bots around him.
